descriptionHtml:
I worked on this in 2015 I have no idea if it still works but i figured I'd get the bsa and esp online before it disappears from my hard drive. So it hasnt been tested since I no longer have Skyrim & the creation kit installed.

Tom [i]should[/i] be located in Castle Dour, Solitude.
